query: SELECT id, name, slug, atoll, overview, featured, published FROM island_guides WHERE name = 'Dhigurah' ORDER BY id;
command: mysql --batch --raw --column-names --default-character-set=utf8mb4 --host gateway03.us-east-1.prod.aws.tidbcloud.com --port 4000 --user 3FFv3TtDUeNbYDM.root --database JUCCYykxYWxAcNny3wop55 --execute SELECT id, name, slug, atoll, overview, featured, published FROM island_guides WHERE name = 'Dhigurah' ORDER BY id;

rows.name: Dhigurah
rows.overview: Dhigurah is famous for its pristine house reef, making it an ideal destination for snorkelers and divers. The island has a welcoming atmosphere, numerous guesthouses, and local restaurants. It's also known for excellent whale shark encounters during the dry season.
